entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TypeSymbol of unbound generic does not return any member or type information #66512
  • C# and VB operation trees are different for logically the same code #66511
  • [API Proposal]: Preprocessing symbol APIs #66510
  • Keyword color for u8 identifier is broken in VS 17.5 Preview 3 #66507

Closed

  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • CreateCompilation default option to detect 'unsafe' keyword #66509
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix handling of Regex classification when splitting to multiple lines #66508
    Area-IDE
  • Block instrumentation improvements #66506
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Clean up some checks in FileChangeWatcher.Context.EnqueueWatchingFile #66488
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
